column1: Naruto's Noodles - Believe It!,[Scene opens on Naruto Uzumaki slurping ramen in his iconic orange jumpsuit.]
column2: Naruto: (mouth full) "Ramen is the secret to my ninja strength. Believe it!"
column3: [Cut to Sasuke holding a cup of instant noodles unimpressed.]
column4: Sasuke: "Ramen Ninja's instant noodles? You're telling me this is why you're Hokage?"
column5: Naruto: (dramatic anime pose) "Yes! With our exclusive flavor packets infused with the power of the Hidden Leaf Village you'll never go hungry during training again!"
column6: [Suddenly Kakashi appears reading a menu instead of his usual book.]
column7: Kakashi: "I approve. 10/10. Would ninja-run to the store for more."
column8: [Closing shot of all characters slurping ramen together as the Ramen Ninja logo appears.]
column9: Voiceover: "Ramen Ninja: The noodle choice for future Hokages!", Ramen Ninja Inc

column1: Elon’s Anime Adventures - Tesla AI Goes 2D, [Elon Musk drawn in anime style sits in a Tesla.]
column2: Elon: (dramatic anime monologue) "To create the future I must harness the power of anime!"
column3: [Tesla transforms into a giant mecha. Elon dons a pilot suit and strikes a Jojo-esque pose.]
column4: Elon: "With Tesla AI even your dreams of going 2D can come true."
column5: [Grimes appears also animated singing in the background as the Tesla-mecha fights a giant gasoline-powered kaiju.]
column6: [Victory scene: Elon and Grimes sipping boba tea in the Tesla cockpit.]
column7: Voiceover: "Tesla AI: Driving humanity into the anime future—one episode at a time.", Tesla

column1: Shrek’s Skincare Routine - Layers of Beauty, [Shrek stands in front of a bathroom mirror applying green face cream.]
column2: Shrek: "Listen here Donkey. Beauty is like an onion—it's got layers!"
column3: [Donkey pops his head into the frame.]
column4: Donkey: "And stinks if you don’t use Swamp Smooth!"
column5: [Montage of Shrek using exfoliating mud Fiona applying cucumber slices and Puss in Boots purring while holding a bottle of lotion.]
column6: Shrek: "With Swamp Smooth even ogres like me can glow up."
column7: Voiceover: "Swamp Smooth: Unleash your inner beauty... ogre-style.", Swamp Smooth Skincare
